name: The Butterflies Garden
description:
As the soothing lights came through the cubes,
the life came into the garden,
and the butterflies became to appear.

But the wish of survival forced each race
of butterflies to confront each other ...
Here came the butterflies war.


Requirements: some less than 5 years old computer (preferentially with a dedicated graphic card), and any Windows (from 98 to 8 included), or Linux
